definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
to get panicky/to lose one's head/(coll.) (after 得) unbearably/terribly

sentences.english: At that question the stranger suddenly lost countenance.
sentences.chinese: 經那一問，陌生人突然驚慌失色。

sentences.english: When he saw the mountain torrents rushing down with a devastating force, he was consternated.
sentences.chinese: 看到山洪來勢兇猛時，他驚慌失色。
